ValidationRule.description: Case cannot be moved from In Progress, Closed, Resolved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Vendor Hold'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Customer Response'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_Help',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Requester Response'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_Help',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_Help',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Community_Help',ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Jira_Ticket_Opened'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'New')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't move the Case Status. Please move the Case to 'In Progress' then select status.
